main event: On July 1, 1963, a round and glowing object was observed moving at high altitude in Glen Ellyn, Illinois.
interesting points: The object was viewed through a TV and moved from 140 to 160 azimuth to the West., The sighting lasted for about 1 hour and 30 minutes., The object was reported to have disappeared and then reappeared behind some trees., The observer reported seeing a similar object again on December 13, 1963., The initial observation was evaluated as possibly being a satellite or aircraft.
witness description: An 11-year-old male who also mentioned another witness, John Stevenson, 414 Hillside, Glen Ellyn, Illinois.
